Weâ€™re keeping it simple and fun! Join us at Snack Bar Cabahia to celebrate I Love Free Software Day with good vibes, great company, and a big THANK YOU to all the amazing people who make Free Software possible.
The meeting will be just a relaxed get-together to chat, share stories, and enjoy some drinks and snacks. Whether youâ€™re a developer, user, or just curious about Free Software, youâ€™re welcome!
Meet fellow Free Software lovers in Istria.
Raise a glass to the maintainers and contributors who keep our software free and open.
Hang out, share ideas, and celebrate the freedom to use, study, share, and improve software.
